text: The half-life of <extra_id_0> c-jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA was similar ( 45-50 min ) in both untreated and okadaic acid - induced cells .
In contrast , treatment with both okadaic acid and cycloheximide was associated with stabilization ( t 1 / 2 = 90 min ) of <extra_id_0> c-jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transcripts .

Taken together , these findings indicate that the induction of <extra_id_0> c-jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transcription by okadaic acid is controlled primarily by a transcriptional mechanism .
